name: Day at the Museum
description:
#KSUGameJam

Lingus was admiring a piece of beautiful artwork on a class field trip to the local art museum when he suddenly realized his class had moved on with out him and left him behind! His imagination runs wild as he fights his way through the maze of the museum. Can you escape?

Controls:

WASD: move

Mouse: aim

Left click: swing sword

Right click: throw boomerang

Esc: quit

R: restart

Game created by Zach Randolph, Michael Kovar, Grant Davis, and Jaden Goter
